segments.text: The whole kitchen is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and the kids are about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this, it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet and stop the kids before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is so slippery, and the stool is about to tip—this is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the panic rising just looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but it’s looking more and more likely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’d be screaming if I were there, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just too much to handle, I need to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
